name: Sudoku Game Collection Mania HD Free - The Classic Brain Quest Trainer Puzzle Pack for iPad & iPhone
name_original: Sudoku Game Collection Mania HD Free - The Classic Brain Quest Trainer Puzzle Pack for iPad & iPhone
description:
!!! Simply the best sudoku game pack !!!

!!! Totally Fantastic gameplay !!!

Play sudoku games now with new elements, flags, alphabets, colors and numbers. Try it to yourself how much easier/harder each elements are compared to others. This will take sudoku puzzle to the new level. All sudoku game contains three difficulty levels.
This game collection contains two other fun and challeging puzzle games. Number Slide puzzle has one difficulty level, but Color Slide puzzle contains three difficulty levels, which give you great learning curve for the game. This is great game also to try improve your time and how many moves you need to solve puzzle.

+ support iOS 7
+ easy gameplay
+ simple use
+ six different games (flag,alphabet,color,number,slide)
+ game center leaderboard
+ great game statistic
+ responsive controls
+ unique style
+ play your own background music
+ submit results to facebook (if you like)
+ relax and relieve stress
+ smooth gameplay
+ smooth and beautiful animations

[ MORE GAMES ]

We have also made other awesome games, so type ”codecube brothers” to itunes search field and you can find our other games, which are already available in the appstore! Happy gaming! :)

[ FEEDBACK ]

We can't answer messages that are written on reviews, so please send your feedback, wishes and bug reports to us support [at] ccbrothers [dot] com.

Thanks for your support!
